alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:03PM MDT until July 21 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND EAST CENTRAL LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 603 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Apple Springs, or near Sturgis, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Fort Meade around 610 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 29 and 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
